tgt_original: 地獄治罰世間賊害、獄卒守護按治無遺，隨處遇會極為痛惱，使勿為冤。 於久遠時無諸繫縛，捍勞忍苦破煩惱賊淨盡無餘，於三有中被勝甲冑，執持器仗敗諸魔冤解眾生縛，由先脩習以少剋苦而得成就。

src_original: tathā sarvaduṣkhôtpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānâbhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /  etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-  [ Cambridge MS f86b ---> ]
tgt_original: 於諸眾生脩苦樂想，謂諸苦生時如其處所脩習樂想，住樂想者即能成辦此果得三摩地，名超諸法樂。

src_original: uktaṃ hi pitāputrasamāgame /
tgt_original: 如《父子集會經》云：

src_original: asti bhagavan sarvadharmasukhakrānto nāma samādhiḥ /

src_original: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /  nâduṣkhâsukhāṃ /
tgt_original: 若菩薩得是三摩地者，於諸事緣受如是樂、受不苦不樂。

tgt_original: 非一因緣如其處所而得樂想，譬若有人以因緣故，斷截手足及耳鼻等，耳鼻斷已如其處所而得樂想，及以鞭杖之所打扑翻如樂想，或為牢獄繫閉捶撻。

src_original: [ Bendall ed p182 ---> ]  jñâiva pravartate bandhanâgāreṣv api praks.iptasya //  tailapācikaṃ vā kriyamāṇasya /  ikṣukuṭṭitavad vā kuṭṭhyamānasya /  naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 謂作衣者、然酥燈者、然油燈者、碾蔗漿等者，如其處所而住樂想。

src_original: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya //  kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
tgt_original: 作鵂鶹面者、作師子面者、撚曝󰱭者，乃至造金錢者、造飲食者、供象酒等者，翻如樂想。

src_original: akṣiṇy-utpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vâghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
tgt_original: 或為挑目破壞命根，諸有損害及墮首等，翻如樂想。

src_original: na duṣkhasaṃjñā /  nâduṣkhâsukhasaṃjñā //
tgt_original: 無苦樂想。

src_original: tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /  samādhānāya yujyeta /  samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /  bhāvayed aśubhâdikaṃ //  ity etāni tāvat kleśaśuddher uddeśapadāni //
tgt_original: 彼脩行者暫息雜亂而心無等持，然此止息亦等持攝尚無少果，況餘淨諸煩惱設修此觀亦亡少善，乃至說淨諸煩惱。

src_original: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ caratâitat praṇidhānam abhūt /  ye māṃ bhojayeran /  te upaśamaśamasukhasya lābhino-  [ Cambridge MS f87a ---> ]
tgt_original: 此菩薩摩訶薩如是願力長夜修作，若我為諸走使得近妙樂；

src_original: bhaveyuḥ /  ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /

src_original: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇâchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyerann iti //
tgt_original: 若遇惡言譏刺打扑刀仗割截乃至諸壞命根，一切所有得菩提樂，成證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。

src_original: sâibhir manaskāraiḥ samanvāgatâitena karmaṇā /  ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvânugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /  sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 具足如是作意、如是事業、如是願力，亦復具足一切眾生隨知樂想親近脩習，於彼業報多所脩作，而得超諸法樂三摩地。
